backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing implemented Solitaire dialog behaviors and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend Solitaire files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component enabling dark mode and rendering the Solitaire page.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/componen: Renders individual cards with suit styling, lock state, face-down appearance, and optional drag interactions.
Toolbar component providing buttons for new game, undo, hint, scores, and preferences.
Displays move count or a disabled indicator depending on tracking settings.
Modal dialog allowing users to configure timer, move tracking, and ask-again settings.
Shows formatted elapsed time or a disabled message based on timer settings.
A dialog allowing players to toggle timer, move tracking, and ask-again preferences before starting a new game.
Component for rendering card piles with support for click selection, hints, empty states, and drag-and-drop interactions.
Leaderboard dialog displaying best times and move counts using provided playthrough results.
Win screen showing the player's result and top leaderboard entries with an option to start a new game.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/hooks/us: Hook managing a game timer tied to game instance, with start/stop control and formatted elapsed time.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/preferen: LocalStorage-backed module for loading and saving timer, move tracking, and ask-again preferences.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/results/: Hook storing playthrough results in localStorage and deriving leaderboards sorted by time and moves.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Utility functions for encoding, validating, and handling drag-and-drop payloads for moving cards.
Generates the first valid hint by checking moves from waste or tableau to foundations or tableau, or drawing from stock.
Implements snapshot-based history tracking with undo support for solitaire game states.
Provides core solitaire logic including deck creation, shuffling, dealing, card movement rules, and stock drawing.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/Solitair: Main Solitaire gameplay container managing state, dialogs, preferences, timer, and result tracking.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/solitair: Defines card, game state, selection, hint structures, and utility helpers for ranks, suits, and colors.
Checks whether all foundation piles contain 13 cards to determine a win.
frontend/src/features/solitaire/useSolit: React reducer hook managing solitaire state, moves, history, hints, and UI interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and auth-client management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are needed for solitaire.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theming.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge and normalize class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing solitaire game goals, architecture notes, known bugs, and existing feature definitions for tracking build state.
